0pt"><span lang="EN-US">输入输出函数与缓冲区</span></span></b></a></span><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 7.5pt 0cm;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">#</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">转</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin-top: 7.5pt;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言输入输出流和缓冲区的深入理解</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
C</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">语言缓冲区（缓存）详解</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">缓冲区又称为缓存，它是内存空间的一部分。也就是说，在内存空间中预留了一定的存储空间，这些存储空间用来缓冲输入或输出的数据，这部分预留的空间就叫做缓冲区。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">缓冲区根据其对应的是输入设备还是输出设备，分为输入缓冲区和输出缓冲区。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">为什么要引入缓冲区</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:red;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">比如我们从磁盘里取信息，我们先把读出的数据放在缓冲区，计算机再直接从缓冲区中取数据，等缓冲区的数据取完后再去磁盘中读取，</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">这样就可以减少磁盘的读写次数，再加上计算机对缓冲区的操作大大快于对磁盘的操作，故应用缓冲区可大大提高计算机的运行速度。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">又比如，我们使用打印机打印文档，由于打印机的打印速度相对较慢，我们先把文档输出到打印机相应的缓冲区，打印机再自行逐步打印，这时我们的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">可以处理别的事情。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;background:
yellow;mso-highlight:yellow;mso-font-kerning:0pt">现在您基本明白了吧，缓冲区就是一块内存区，它用在输入输出设备和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;background:yellow;mso-highlight:yellow;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">CPU</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:

0pt">对动态内存的错误观念</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">有人对某一只在函数内使用的指针动态分配了内存，用完后不释放。其理由是：函数运行结束后，函数内的所有变量全部消亡。这是错误的。动态分配的内存是在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">堆</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">”</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">里定义，并不随函数结束而消亡。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">有人对某动态分配了内存的指针，用完后直接设置为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NULL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。其理由是：已经为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NULL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">了，这就释放了。这也是错误的。指针可以任意赋值，而内存并没有释放；相反，内存释放后，指针也并不为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt">NULL</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:

宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
